name: Rob the Slayer - Run Slash Jump!
name_original: Rob the Slayer - Run Slash Jump!
description:
Rob the Slayer is an action side scroller platformer made entirely in pixel art. Help Rob fight the evil in this epic adventure.

Rob the Slayer Features:

-15 Exciting Levels
-3 Boss Fights
-Upgradable skills

How to Play:

-Run, jump, and slash!

Controls:

-Simple and easy
-On screen touch controls
